name: Chalk Bag for Rock Climbing, Bouldering, and Weightlifting - Asian-Inspired Design - Premium Chalk Bucket with Quick-Clip Belt, Zipper Pocket, Brush Holder
short_description: Unique Asian-Inspired Design This chalk bag features a nostalgic yogurt cup shape with a white body, red accents, and embroidered logo — perfect for Asian snack lovers and climbers who want to stand out.
Versatile for All Climbing Styles Ideal for rock climbing, bouldering, gym sessions, and outdoor adventures. This chalk pouch adds personality to your gear while delivering top-notch performance.
Lightweight & Travel-Friendly Designed to be ultra-light and compact, this chalk bag fits easily in your gym bag and stays secure during climbs, making it perfect for indoor or outdoor use.

Adjustable Waist Strap & Gear Organizer Includes a quick-clip adjustable belt for a custom fit. Comes with an elastic strap and brush holder to keep climbing tape, brushes, or accessories organized and accessible.
Zipper Pocket for Essentials Back zipper compartment securely holds small items like keys, cards, or climbing tape so you can focus on the wall without worrying about where your gear is.
Secure Drawstring Closure Drawstring toggle top keeps chalk from spilling and allows easy access during climbs. Great for minimizing mess and keeping chalk dry between uses.
Soft Fleece Inner Lining Interior fleece helps coat your hands evenly with chalk for better grip while reducing dust and chalk waste — essential for bouldering and sport climbing.
Durable Tear-Resistant Construction Made with high-quality, reinforced fabric and strong stitching to withstand tough routes, daily training, and long-term use without tearing or fraying.
product_description: Introducing the **Mefu Chalk Bag** – the ultimate blend of functionality and playful design for climbing enthusiasts! This unique chalk bag is meticulously crafted to resemble a iconic asian snack making it a standout addition to your climbing gear. Features: **1. Eye-catching Design:** - Inspired by the iconic snack, this chalk bag features a body with vibrant accents, capturing the essence of the beloved beverage. The embroidered logo adds a touch of authenticity and charm. **2. Durable Construction:** - Made from high-quality, tear-resistant fabric, this chalk bag is designed to withstand the rigors of climbing. The sturdy stitching ensures long-lasting durability. **3. Fleece Felt Inner Liner:** - The interior of the chalk bag is lined with soft fleece felt, providing a smooth texture that helps to evenly distribute chalk on your hands. The plush liner also helps to contain chalk dust, keeping your gear clean. **4. Secure Drawstring Closure:** - The top of the bag features a reliable drawstring closure with a toggle lock, allowing you to securely close the bag and prevent chalk spillage. The easy-to-use mechanism ensures quick access during climbs. **5. Convenient Back Zipper Pocket:** - For added convenience, the bag includes an extra zipper pocket on the back. This discreet pocket is perfect for storing small essentials like keys, ID cards, or even a climbing brush. **6. Adjustable Strap with Organizer:** - The Chalk Bag comes with an adjustable waist strap, allowing for a customizable fit. The strap features an organizer, keeping the excess strap neatly managed and out of your way while climbing. **7. Lightweight and Portable:** - Weighing in at just a few ounces, this chalk bag is lightweight and easy to carry. Its compact size ensures it won’t weigh you down, making it perfect for both indoor and outdoor climbing sessions. Aesthetic Appeal: With its whimsical design and practical features, the Chalk Bag is not just a climbing accessory but a conversation starter. Whether you’re scaling rock walls or bouldering, this chalk bag combines fun and functionality, making it a must-have for climbers who appreciate unique gear. Specifications: - **Material:** High-quality fabric, fleece felt inner liner - **Closure:** Drawstring with toggle lock - **Additional Storage:** Back zipper pocket - **Strap:** Adjustable waist strap with organizer - **Dimensions:** (Dimensions based on actual measurements) - **Weight:** (Weight based on actual measurements) Perfect for: - Rock Climbing - Bouldering - Gym Climbing - Outdoor Adventures Upgrade your climbing experience with the Mefu Chalk Bag – where fun meets functionality! Order yours today and stand out on your next climb.

Two Large Zip Pockets - With two fabric-sealed big zipper pockets there’s plenty of storage space for you to keep your phone and other essentials right where you need them. Not only great for indoor climbing and work out, but also a great gift with our cool animal design.

Created By Climbers For Climbers - Our chalk bag has been tested on the mountain walls, crags and boulders of New Zealand, which have led us to carefully refine our design, including features such as extra-grippy zip pullers, fabric-sealed zippers, adding brush-holders and much more.

name: BLACK DIAMOND Mondo Chalk Pot | Stable, Wide-Base Bucket | Magnetic Closure | Large Chalk Storage for Bouldering | REPO Gray
short_description: STABLE, WIDE-BASE CONSTRUCTION: Built with a broad, flat base to prevent tipping during dynamic bouldering sessions. Stays upright on uneven surfaces so chalk stays where you need it.
LARGE CHALK STORAGE CAPACITY: Generous interior volume holds plenty of loose chalk for long gym sessions or full days at the boulders. Ideal for climbers who prefer a bucket-style setup.

MAGNETIC & ROLL-TOP CLOSURE: Dual-seal system uses a magnetic top for fast access and a roll-top closure to lock in chalk during transport. Keeps chalk contained and reduces spills in your pack or car.
EXTERNAL BRUSH POCKETS & ZIP STORAGE: Features multiple brush holders plus a zippered pocket for tape, keys, or small accessories. Keeps essential tools organized and easy to access.
DURABLE, CRAG-READY MATERIALS: Built from tough fabrics designed to withstand abrasion, travel, and daily gym use. A reliable chalk bucket for outdoor bouldering and indoor training.
product_description: The Black Diamond Mondo Chalk Pot is the ultimate bouldering essential, with a stable design and magnetic closure to minimize accidental chalk dumps. Brush holders are compatible with a variety of brush sizes, a zippered pocket easily accommodates your phone and keys, and a roll top seal manages chalk when you shove the Mondo into your pack on the hike out. The "repo" or "assorted" color is built from repurposed fabric scraps from our sewing factory and comes in assorted colors. Colorway will vary due to repurposed fabric scraps. The selected color will be primary color but the item you receive will not match the product photo shown exactly.
